translated: Edström, Thord Gösta Fredrik, Director, Växjö, born on July 15, 1901 in Frösö parish, Jämtland county, Sweden, son of the vicar Johan Olof E. and Hanna Cederberg. Married in 1932 to Margit Griimisigård. Graduated from the forestry course at ISIKOGISIBÖIGISK in 1927. Traveled to Norway, Denmark, England, Holland, Belgium, France, Switzerland, and Germany. Executive director for the forestry association for southeastern Sweden, covering Kronoberg, Blekinge, Kalmar County south, North Kalmar County and Östergötland. Executive director and board member of Skogsäg. Ind. A-B 43, Hultsfreds Träförädlings A-B 45, A-B Standardhuis 45, A-B Ideal-huis 44, Västerviks Trävaru A-B 37, Restad A-B 44 and Lantmännens Byggn. A-B 45. Board member of Trävaru A-B Skåne-Smål. 45, A-B Fören. Sv. Trä-impregneringsverk 46, Svies trähus-fabr. riksförb. 46, S. Sv:es virkesmät-nijfiören. 44, Sv. ’träimipiregnerimgisverkens riksfören. 45, board member of Sv. Trähus-fabr. expo^rtfören. 47 and Svies Skogsäg ifören. riksförb. 47. He was a member of the forestry committee on measuring timber in 1943. He received a medal from KAK and was a member of the Freemasons (VIL gr.). He wrote articles in newspapers and magazines. His hobby was reading books.

structured.name: Thord Gösta Fredrik Edström
structured.description: Thord Gösta Fredrik Edström was a Swedish director and forestry expert. He was born on July 15, 1901, in Frösö parish, Jämtland county, Sweden. He married Margit Griimisigård in 1932. He graduated from the forestry course at ISIKOGISIBÖIGISK in 1927. He was the executive director for the forestry association for southeastern Sweden, covering Kronoberg, Blekinge, Kalmar County south, North Kalmar County, and Östergötland. He was also a board member of various forestry companies and associations and received a KAK medal. He was a member of the Freemasons (VIL gr.) and wrote articles in newspapers and magazines. His hobby was reading books.
